pkgmetadata.longdescription: dcaenc is a Free Software (LGPL-licensed) encoder for the DTS Coherent Acoustics audio format. It may be useful if you want to create a DTS CD or a DTS soundtrack for a DVD from a 6-channel PCM wav file using linux. Another use case is related to real-time encoding of multichannel PCM audio output from arbitrary linux applications for transmission over SPDIF.
